description: Thank you for this application. I was really struggling with managing audio sources on my workstation. I patch my audio with ease and it's all comprihesible . Na'sai kala magka
Works PErfect, easy to use to monitor xruns and to rewire the softwares and plugins

Worked instantly without any hassle. Easy to use and looks the best compared to the alternatives. I was also able to debug issues with my latency thanks to the Profiler tab. Feels like an official app.
